case_converter_extension_desc.message: Easily convert the selected text in upper case, lower case, ect.

ccm_upper_case.description: Context menu option for upper case

ccm_lower_case.description: Context menu option for lower case

ccm_email.description: Context menu option to convert into email format

ccm_slugify.description: Context menu option to convert into slug format

ccm_urlencode.description: Context menu option to encode URL

ccm_urldecode.description: Context menu option to decode URL

ccm_wo_accent.description: Context menu option to replace accented characters by their unaccented equivalent

ccm_sentence_case.description: Option from the context menu to uppercase according sentences

msg_not_editable_element.description: Information message about non-editable text conversion

ccm_informations.description: Context menu option to display information about selected text
